original: 東海郡人，漢末方士。時人以為神仙，魏明帝時於酆都平都山飛升。《神仙傳》中稱其曾與麻姑對談，此亦為「滄海桑田」出處。
text: Donghai County native, alchemist at the end of Han Dynasty. People thought of gods at the time, and Emperor Wei Ming ascended Pingdu Mountain in Fengdu. It is said in 'The Legend of the Immortals' that he had a conversation with Magu, which is also the source of 'the vicissitudes of life'.
